entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning this evening and ending after midnight. Clearing before morning. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
